bibl.title: Power of Attorney, Jedediah Morse to Ebenezer Hazard.,1799 May 18
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Know all Men by these Presents that I Jedediah Morse of Charlestown in the County of &State of Massachusetts do hereby constitute &appoint Ebenezer Hazard of the City of Philadelphia my true &lawful Attorney for me &in my Name to sell assign &transfer the whole or any Part of the Stock standing in my Name on the Books of the President &Directors of the Insurance Company of North America to any Person or Persons whatsoever with Power to act as fully in the Premises as I could do were I personally present: hereby ratifying and confirming whatsoever he shall lawfully do therein. In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand &Seal in Philadelphia the Eighteenth day of May one Thousand seven hundred &ninety nine.
